mapper.select: select aq_no, aq_title, aq_date, aq_views, aq_answers from QNA order by aq_no

select aq_no, aq_title, aq_date, aq_views, aq_answers from QNA
where AQ_TITLE like '%'|| #{searchBox} ||'%'
where AQ_CONTENT like '%'|| #{searchBox} ||'%'
order by aq_no
select aq_no, aq_title, aq_date, aq_redate, aq_answers from QNA where user_id = #{username} order by aq_no

select AQ_NO , AA_NO , QNA_RPL.RPL_NO , QNA_ANS.ADMIN_ID AS ANS_ADMIN_ID , QNA_ANS.USER_ID AS ANS_USER_ID , AA_CONTENT , AA_DATE , AA_REDATE , QNA_RPL.RPL_CONTENT , QNA_RPL.ADMIN_ID AS RPL_ADMIN_ID , QNA_RPL.USER_ID AS RPL_USER_ID , QNA_RPL.RPL_DATE , QNA_RPL.RPL_REDATE from QNA_ANS LEFT OUTER JOIN QNA_RPL USING (AA_NO) where AQ_NO = #{aqNo} order by QNA_RPL.RPL_NO, aa_no
select aa_no, aq_no, aa_content, aa_date, aa_redate from QNA_ANS where USER_ID = #{username} order by aa_no
